channel.title: Finding A Elite Team / Got Great Plans
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/1161/titlez.png[/img][/center]
[center]I would like to start of with a great big HELLO to you all and thank you all for taking your time reading my topic.
This year I hope to gather a Elite Team of hard working staff to help me along my adventure.. I am currently looking for hard working staff memebers to be aboard my great big adventure with some amazing idea's and plans which could become something in the future to come, that's only if i get the correct people on my team.
[font=comic sans ms][u][i]I DO NOT WANT TO APPLY PEOPLE WHO WILL WORK FOR A LITTLE WHILE AND THEN GIVE UP, I WANT PEOPLE WHO WILL STAND BY EACH OTHER GIRL OR BOY, I DON'T CARE AS LONG WE ARE A WICKED GROUP.
!!!!ONE LAST MAIN POINTER, AFTER SOME LITTLE PROBLEMS I AM GOING TO BUY A VPS WITH MY DEBIT CARD, SO WHAT IM TRYING TO SAY IS I WILL BE STAYING FULL CONTROLL OF IT. DON'T LIKE IT DON'T APPLY!!!! [/i][/u][/font]
List of staff that I am currently looking for (will be updated later on):[/center]
[ul][li] We need the server to come alive with the ELITE CODERS out their, I don't know how many we will need and i don't personly code my self so i can't work on it my self, but i have other Skills that will help us in the future to come so do not worry about that. ;) *Leadership deploma and serval NVQ's
[/li][li]
[list][li] [/li][/list]
[center]That's all for the staff for now only! i will be needing more if the adventure carrys on, i will carry on working on the web site and forum and will not give up hope just yet, so if their is any coders out their please PM me or reply here. Kind Regards Kyraptos AKA Ricki[/center]
[CENTER]_______________________________[/CENTER]
[CENTER][b]Current Updates[/b][/center]
Currently I have been working on some designs for the forums and the client background and here are the examples
Forums Skin (we will be using Zetaboards as our forums)
[IMG]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/7794/projectzetaprev.png[/img]
Client Background, I am also working on a wicked MS paint design but for now we can use this:
[IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/3407/pzetaprev2.png[/img][/ul]

item.title: Finding A Elite Team / Got Great Plans
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:22, topic:335317”][quote author=Koolvin link=topic=431713.msg3169804#msg3169804 date=1270338953]

AN not A -.-

lol grammar nazi :o
[/quote]Not so much grammar nazi, more basic knowledge nazi. In my opinion, if you can’t use proper diction, or even close to proper diction, you most likely can’t code at all either.

Albert Einstein couldn’t spell either yet he was a genius. “Don’t judge a book by its cover”[/quote]

Agreed.

Read full topic

[quote=“Souls`, post:20, topic:335317”]Yes i am accepted?

Great. When can i start.[/quote]

I am about to send you a PM with details of my MSN and current updates and if their is somethink that I have not covered please tell me right away so i can responed as quickly as i can.

Kind Regards, Ricki

Read full topic

item.title: Finding A Elite Team / Got Great Plans
item.dc:creator: @Kyraptos Kyraptos
item.description:
@Kyraptos wrote:

Hey Tony, Thank you very much for your reply and what you have stated I’ve currently removed JavaGuru from co-owner postion. ( I have sent him a few message by MSN & on this forum saying why i removed him from this Elite Project)

I am sorry for not xplaining alot of information about my ideas " Their is to many leachers that will try still my idea’s and put it into their servers I also would like to see some refences about your self and your work.

Kind Regards Ricki

Note: Regards to this superb long-term project, I would like this to take time I do not want to rush things to quick, i would like to make this project a one of a kind and to take all the time needed.

if you need any more information please do PM me or just reply back here

Read full topic
item.source: Finding A Elite Team / Got Great Plans

item.title: Finding A Elite Team / Got Great Plans
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Hello,

My name is Tony Tannous and I am a Server Coder/Devoloper, Forum Creator, Forum GURU and also an Assitant Manger. I will be applying for this devolopment as most of my other devolopments that i have been in were that they were all arguing and then most people deleted all the files. I was then told that people said i deleted the files. I had nothing to do, i also like how you are making people stick together. I am 18(turning 19) and i would like to join because this is a great devolopment.

Things i will do:
Graphics
Server Coder
Assitant Manager(most likely not.)
Forum Administrator

Secondary things:
Server Moderator
Server Devoloper
Forum Creator
Domain Manager
Client Designer

Read full topic
